uk.co.crider.jablus.env

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.IntegerData
      • uk.co.crider.jablus.env.Time
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data, Data0D, Data0D.Integer, DriverDynamic

    public class Time
extends IntegerData
implements DriverDynamic
    Represents time steps. Time here is abstract and could represent a block, year, decade etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface uk.co.crider.jablus.data.Data0D
